trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Start-Transcript
trans-unit.target: Start-Transcript

trans-unit.source: Start-Transcript
trans-unit.target: Start-Transcript

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Creates a record of all or part of a Windows PowerShell session to a text file.
trans-unit.target: 建立全部或部分 Windows PowerShell 工作階段的文字檔案的記錄。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: ByPath (Default)
trans-unit.target: ByPath （預設值）

trans-unit.source: ByLiteralPath
trans-unit.target: ByLiteralPath

trans-unit.source: ByOutputDirectory
trans-unit.target: ByOutputDirectory

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Start-Transcript** cmdlet creates a record of all or part of a Windows PowerShell session to a text file.
trans-unit.target: **Start-transcript** 指令程式會建立一筆記錄的全部或部分 Windows PowerShell 工作階段的文字檔案。

trans-unit.source: The transcript includes all command that the user types and all output that appears on the console.
trans-unit.target: 文字記錄包含使用者輸入的所有命令，以及顯示在主控台上的所有輸出。

trans-unit.source: Starting in Windows PowerShell 5.0, **Start-Transcript** includes the host name in the generated file name of all transcripts.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows PowerShell 5.0 **Start-transcript** 的所有文字記錄產生的檔案名稱中包含的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is especially useful when your enterprise's logging is centralized.
trans-unit.target: 當您的企業記錄會集中，這會特別有用。

trans-unit.source: Files that are created by the **Start-Transcript** cmdlet include random characters in names to prevent potential overwrites or duplication when two or more transcripts are started simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 建立的檔案 **Start-transcript** 指令程式以避免潛在的名稱中包含隨機字元會覆寫或重複時同時啟動兩個或多個文字記錄。

trans-unit.source: This also prevents unauthorized discovery of transcripts that are stored in a centralized file share.
trans-unit.target: 這也可防止未經授權的探索，會儲存在集中式的檔案共用的成績單。

trans-unit.source: Additionally in Windows PowerShell 5.0, the Start-Transcript cmdlet works in Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: 此外在 Windows PowerShell 5.0，Start-transcript cmdlet 適用於 Windows PowerShell ise。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Start a transcript file with default settings
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 使用預設設定啟動文字記錄檔

trans-unit.source: This command starts a transcript in the default file location.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會在預設檔案位置中啟動文字記錄。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Start a transcript file at a specific location
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 啟動文字記錄檔中指定的位置

trans-unit.source: This command starts a transcript in the Transcript0.txt file in C:\transcripts.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會在 C:\transcripts 中啟動 Transcript0.txt 檔案中的文字記錄。

trans-unit.source: Since the *NoClobber* parameter is used, the command prevents any existing files from being overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 由於 *NoClobber* 參數，命令會防止任何現有的檔案遭到覆寫。

trans-unit.source: If the Transcript0.txt file already exists, the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Transcript0.txt 檔案已存在，命令就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Append
trans-unit.target: -新增

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet adds the new transcript to the end of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 表示，這個指令程式會將新的文字記錄新增到現有的檔案結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the *Path* parameter to specify the file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 *路徑* 參數指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Allows the cmdlet to append the transcript to an existing read-only file.
trans-unit.target: 可讓 Cmdlet 將文字記錄附加到現有的唯讀檔案。

trans-unit.source: When used on a read-only file, the cmdlet changes the file permission to read-write.
trans-unit.target: 針對唯讀檔案使用時，此 Cmdlet 會將檔案權限變更為讀寫。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet cannot override security restrictions when this parameter is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用此參數時，此指令程式無法覆寫安全性限制。

trans-unit.source: -IncludeInvocationHeader
trans-unit.target: -IncludeInvocationHeader

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet logs the time stamp when commands are run.
trans-unit.target: 表示此指令程式在執行命令時，會記錄時間戳記。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a location to the transcript file.
trans-unit.target: 指定文字記錄檔的位置。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the *Path* parameter, the value of the *LiteralPath* parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 *路徑* 參數、 值 *LiteralPath* 完全依照其輸入，使用參數。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks inform Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -NoClobber
trans-unit.target: -NoClobber

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet will not overwrite of an existing file.
trans-unit.target: 表示，此 cmdlet 不會覆寫現有的檔案。

trans-unit.source: By default, if a transcript file exists in the specified path, **Start-Transcript** overwrites the file without warning.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，如果文字記錄檔存在於指定的路徑、 **Start-transcript** 覆寫檔案而不發出警告。

trans-unit.source: -OutputDirectory
trans-unit.target: -OutputDirectory

trans-unit.source: Specifies a specific path and folder in which to save a transcript.
trans-unit.target: 指定特定路徑和資料夾，用來儲存文字記錄。

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell automatically assigns the transcript name.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 會自動指派的文字記錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies a location to the transcript file.
trans-unit.target: 指定文字記錄檔的位置。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path to a .txt file.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 .txt 檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a path, **Start-Transcript** uses the path in the value of the $Transcript global variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定路徑， **Start-transcript** $Transcript 全域變數的值中使用的路徑。

trans-unit.source: If you have not created this variable, **Start-Transcript** stores the transcripts in the $Home\My Documents directory as \PowerShell_transcript.\<time-stamp\>.txt files.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有建立這個變數， **Start-transcript** 將記錄儲存在 $Home\My Documents 目錄，做為 \powershell_transcript.。\<時間戳記\>.txt 檔案。

trans-unit.source: If any of the directories in the path do not exist, the command fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑中不存在任何目錄，命令就會失敗。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線將物件傳送至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet returns a string that contains a confirmation message and the path to the output file.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會傳回字串，包含確認訊息及輸出檔案的路徑。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: To stop a transcript, use the Stop-Transcript cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如果要停止文字記錄，請使用 Stop-Transcript Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To record an entire session, add the **Start-Transcript** command to your profile.
trans-unit.target: 若要記錄整個工作階段，請新增 **Start-transcript** 命令到您的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Profiles.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Profiles。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.source: Stop-Transcript
trans-unit.target: Stop-Transcript
